WRITING.TEXT: So here's one of mine: if the bathroom is too far away in the night, I'm not above pissing in any container in the room and then just throwing it away the next morning. P.s I'm a female....

Requiem for a Dream. The way Marlon Wayans and Jared Leto were screaming at the end like "MY ARM, MY FUCKING ARM!!!", and, "SOMEBODY HELP US, SOMEBODY PLEASE HELP US!!" and their faces are blurring as if the screen Is vibrating, left my heart feeling like it was going to explode out of my chest with empathy for them :'(
I know that's not the very ending but that's what stuck with me. The hopelessness..

Also people will come right up to you and blow powder like substance in your face that makes you do everything they say. A lot of people get raped or robbed. So don't let strangers approach you! It's beautiful but a country in a crisis will have a lot of desperate citizens doing anything it takes for cash
Don't let yourself get kidnapped and held for a ransom.
Or smacking. Smacking is the absolute worst.

WRITING.TITLE: What's the most irritating habit someone can have?

WRITING.TEXT: Thank you and yes it is tough being in Antarctica for so long. Not much to do with yourself. Plus the south seas are the worst. But it an amazing experience
